None.Name: Infused Mob
None.Description:
Activate to conjure 3 Lost
Crawler next to the target enemy. If not
killed in time those creepy little beasts
will explode after 15 seconds dealing 200
damage to hostile and friendly entities in
a 15m radius, up to 600 in total. Needs to
have gathered 1500 life points from
corpses first. Reusable every 30 seconds.

None.Name: Corpse Gathering
None.Description:
Gathers energy from
nearby corpses equal to their former
maximum life points to enable the
conjuring of Lost Crawler.

None.Name: Revenant's Doom
None.Description:
Activate to bestow the
unit with a curse that will make it
resurrect in case it dies. The resurrected
revenant will only be a shadow of its
former self but it will be endowed with the
same abilities and equal in strength. After
20 seconds the revenant will then die
once and for all. May only be triggered
once.
